data.name: Shortest Common Supersequence For Two Strings
data.description:
# Shortest Common Supersequence For Two Strings
Shortest Common Supersequence of two strings would be a shortest string, that would include both of them: 

Examples: 

Input:  `'rtest', 'short'`, Output: `'shortest'`

Input:  `'shor', 'test'`, Output: `'shortest'` or `'testshor'`

Input:  `'', ''`, Output: `''`

```
# Your task
Your task is to write the code that would take two strings and return their Shortest Common Supersequence

# Shortest Common Supersequence For Multiple Strings
If you liked this kata, you may also like a [harder version](http://www.codewars.com/kata/shortest-common-supersequence)
